util

Class XPathUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.XPathUtil

  • public class XPathUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses a DOM model based XPath API implementation to perform XPath query evaluation on XML documents.
    Author:
    gsanthan

      XPathUtil()

      • evaluateListExpr

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> evaluateListExpr(java.lang.String xpathExpr,
                                                org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                                         throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                                java.io.IOException,
                                                                javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                                javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath query specified by xpathExpr against the XML content specified by the Document object passed as input. Used when the result is a list of nodes in the XML document. Returns the result of the XPath query evaluation as a List of Strings corresponding to the text content in the nodes in the computed result. Note: The document object should not be null
        Parameters:
        xpathExpr -
        document -
        Returns:
        Result of the XPath query evaluation as a List of Strings
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

      • evaluateListExpr

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> evaluateListExpr(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                java.lang.String xpathExpr,
                                                org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                                         throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                                java.io.IOException,
                                                                javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                                javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath query specified by xpathExpr against the XML content specified by the XML file name or Document object passed as input. Used when the result is a list of nodes in the XML document. If the Document object input is not null, the XPath query is performed against this object; otherwise, a DOM model is built from the XML file name input. Returns the result of the XPath query evaluation as a List of Strings corresponding to the text content in the nodes in the computed result.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Input XML file name, used for the XPath query evaluation if document object parameter is null
        xpathExpr - XPath query to be evaluated
        document - Document object containing the DOM model against which the xpathExpr query has to be evaluated
        Returns:
        List of Strings corresponding to the text content in the nodes in the computed result
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

      • evaluateExpr

        public static java.lang.String evaluateExpr(java.lang.String xpathExpr,
                            org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                     throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                            java.io.IOException,
                                            javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                            javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath query specified by xpathExpr against the XML content specified by the Document object passed as input. Returns the result of the XPath query evaluation. Note: The document object should not be null
        Parameters:
        xpathExpr - XPath query to be evaluated
        document - Document object containing the DOM model against which the xpathExpr query has to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the xpathExpr
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

      • evaluateExpr

        public static java.lang.String evaluateExpr(java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.String xpathExpr,
                            org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                     throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                            java.io.IOException,
                                            javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                            javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Evaluates an XPath query specified by xpathExpr against the XML content specified by the XML file name or Document object passed as input. If the Document object input is not null, the XPath query is performed against this object; otherwise, a DOM model is built from the XML file name input. Returns the result of the XPath query evaluation
        Parameters:
        fileName - Input XML file name, used for the XPath query evaluation if document object parameter is null
        xpathExpr - XPath query to be evaluated
        document - Document object containing the DOM model against which the xpathExpr query has to be evaluated
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the xpathExpr
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException

      • makeDocument

                                         throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        Builds a DOM model of the entire input XML file and returns the Document object
        Parameters:

        Returns:
